title: Implement worktree-manager CLI tool
description:
Build a CLI tool that manages git worktrees for the current repository.

Key features:
- wt (interactive): fzf-based picker for switching between worktrees
- wt list: List all worktrees for current repo
- wt add <branch>: Create new worktree
- wt remove <worktree>: Remove worktree
- wt config: Manage configuration

See DESIGN.md for full specification.
